description:
Souma is an eccentric college friend of http://anidb.net/ch86021 [Tetsuo]`s whose expression virtually never changes, who specializes in hyperspace theory. He is the one to suggest that http://anidb.net/ch86019 [Machi]`s neck is actually in another dimension, acting as a wormhole between her head and body.
Source: Demi-chan wa Kataritai Wiki, edited.
name: Souma
